errors.error_description: The `pip install` command is executed before the `git clone` command. This will fail because the `citationhunt/requirements.txt` file does not exist until the repository is cloned.
correction_candidates: Execute `pip install git+https://github.com/eggpi/citationhunt.git#egg=citationhunt` before the `git clone` command.
Correct the order by executing `git clone https://github.com/eggpi/citationhunt.git` before `pip install -r citationhunt/requirements.txt`.
Change the command to `pip install requests` since that is the main dependency.
Remove the `pip install` command entirely and run it after starting the webservice.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the order by executing `git clone https://github.com/eggpi/citationhunt.git` before `pip install -r citationhunt/requirements.txt`.
